Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM ewa_restful A WHERE rs_uid = @rs_uid

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_restful SET rs_method = @rs_method, rs_name = @rs_name, rs_name_en = @rs_name_en, rs_xmlname = @rs_xmlname, rs_itemname = @rs_itemname, rs_parameters = @rs_parameters, rs_memo = @rs_memo, rs_memo_en = @rs_memo_en, rs_mtime = @SYS_DATE WHERE rs_uid = @rs_uid

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* , b.cat_name FROM ewa_restful A LEFT JOIN ewa_restful_catalog B ON A.cat_uid = B.cat_uid WHERE (@cat_uid = A.cat_uid or @cat_uid is null) AND A.rs_status = CASE WHEN @EWA_RECYCLE='1' THEN 'DEL' ELSE 'USED' END

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_restful SET rs_status='DEL' WHERE rs_uid = @rs_uid

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_restful SET rs_status='USED' WHERE rs_uid = @rs_uid

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_restful_catalog SET cat_path = @cat_path, cat_path_full = @cat_path_full, cat_name = @cat_name, cat_name_en = @cat_name_en, cat_memo = @cat_memo, cat_memo_en = @cat_memo_en, cat_ord = @cat_ord, cat_mtime = @SYS_DATE, p0 = @p0, p1 = @p1, p2 = @p2, p3 = @p3, p4 = @p4, p5 = @p5, p6 = @p6, p7 = @p7, p8 = @p8, p9 = @p9 WHERE cat_uid = @cat_uid;

Set.Name: SAct0 SQL
Set.Sql: select a.cat_uid uid_0, a.cat_path path_0 , b.cat_uid uid_1, b.cat_path path_1 , c.cat_uid uid_2, c.cat_path path_2 , d.cat_uid uid_3, d.cat_path path_3 , e.cat_uid uid_4, e.cat_path path_4 , f.cat_uid uid_5, f.cat_path path_5 from ewa_restful_catalog a left join ewa_restful_catalog b on a.cat_puid = b.cat_uid left join ewa_restful_catalog c on b.cat_puid = c.cat_uid left join ewa_restful_catalog d on c.cat_puid = d.cat_uid left join ewa_restful_catalog e on d.cat_puid = e.cat_uid left join ewa_restful_catalog f on e.cat_puid = f.cat_uid where a.cat_uid = @cat_uid

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM ewa_restful_catalog a WHERE cat_status='USED' ORDER BY cat_lvl , cat_ord

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeDelete SQL
Set.Sql: update ewa_restful_catalog set cat_status='DEL' WHERE cat_uid=@cat_uid

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeRename SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE ewa_restful_catalog SET cat_name=@cat_name WHERE cat_uid=@cat_uid

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql:
INSERT INTO ewa_restful_catalog(cat_uid, cat_puid, cat_name, cat_lvl, cat_ord, cat_path, cat_status, cat_ctime, cat_mtime) SELECT @sys_unid, @cat_puid, @cat_name, A.LVL, B.ORD, '', 'USED', @SYS_DATE, @SYS_DATE FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(cat_lvl) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(cat_lvl) + 1 END LVL FROM ewa_restful_catalog WHERE cat_uid = @cat_puid) A, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(cat_ord) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(cat_ord) + 1 END ORD FROM ewa_restful_catalog WHERE cat_puid = @cat_puid) B ;
SELECT * FROM ewa_restful_catalog WHERE cat_uid=@sys_unid
